text: 1.7: Ais 2.5; Zo 3.21; Ef 1.7; Hi 9.14; 1 Pi 1.19; VB 1.5; 7.14Zisas, ana vhava ŋaarar ki. Nza maaŋ muuŋgip vhava ŋaarar kɨrga, nzan tɨvi vhɨra ŋgarav kɨrga, nza vhɨra ana fara muuŋgiap vhava ŋaarar ki. Nza vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi phorga ndava bavira ki. Nza wari tɨgɨp ndava bavira kɨrga, anan Kama Zisas Krais vɨzɨn, nza mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi ruai, nza ŋgarav ki.
